Description.English: Unhides all buildings/ships at game start (also from mods). Advantage is that you see what exists and what is needed for unlocking it.

changelog.1.01: Unlock all ProductionChains and Categories, so you can also see them (buildings still locked)
changelog.1.02: No changes, test update to see if discord modbot messeage works now
changelog.1.021: No changes, test update to see if discord modbot messeage works now
changelog.1.022: Add 'All Buildings' Pool to shared mod.
